name: GRUNGE
description:
Pick and Flick your way through three levels Oozing with Terror in... GRUNGE! A top down Arcade Style Shooter from the talented ghouls at The Tub! Press F4 to toggle fullscreen.

HOW TO PLAY
  • WASD to move.
  • Mouse to aim your Implements of Hideous Destruction. 
  • Left click to fire your HM4 Rocket Pistol.
  • Right click to grab an enemy or object with your Goo Gauntlet.
  • Right click again to throw. 
  • Destroying monsters makes them drop Goo. Collect Goo for ammunition, or press E when your Goo meter is more than 50% full to convert it into health.
  • Held enemies will block bullets . The more shots they block, the more damage they'll do when you fling them away. Block too many shots and the enemy will explode in your hands, dealing damage and temporarily slowing you.
CREDITS
  • ERMAC - Design, promotional art
  • Fruits - Art
  • Klester- Art
  • KG Murphy - Art
  • Noisemaker- Programming, audio
  • Sir Dougle - Design, art

Listen to the GRUNGE Soundtrack here.
